free_text.Content: [li]Doctoral students interested in conducting a training rotation must write a one page proposal delinating the educational objectives and the means by which they intend to achieve them[br/][li]This proposal must be approved by the supervisor, by the host laboratory, as well as by the doctoral program director[br/][li]Training rotations must take place within the first two years of doctoral studies and can last 1-4 months, with a maximum of 4 months in total[br/][li]The examination procedure consists in a project report written in the style of the candidacy exam report[br/]
free_text.Note: Each month of training rotation gives 1 ECTS credit

free_text.Remarque: Each month of training rotation gives 1 ECTS credit
free_text.Contenu: [li]Doctoral students interested in conducting a training rotation must write a one page proposal delinating the educational objectives and the means by which they intend to achieve them[br/][li]This proposal must be approved by the supervisor, by the host laboratory, as well as by the doctoral program director[br/][li]Training rotations must take place within the first two years of doctoral studies and can last 1-4 months, with a maximum of 4 months in total[br/][li]The examination procedure consists in a project report written in the style of the candidacy exam report[br/]
